name: Forest Shenanigans
description:
Play as the non-binary bunny Sal (representation, hell yeah!) in a fantasy forest! Avoid the blue banana peels and be careful of the elven monkeys by using our favourite keys, WAD (S was cut off the group for design reasons, I’m sorry S ). Collect delicious apples because everyone knows that’s a bunny’s favourite food!

Try not to get bored by this overly simplified version of my ambitious project idea. What was meant to be a platformer bullet hell style game, turned into this rushed final project because I spent two (2) days of my one (1) week period in making the trees! Have fun!

Music provided by: http://freemusicarchive.org/music/Mister_Keys/S27-X_II/Mister_Keys_-_S27-X_II_-_...
